title: Tokyo Ravens - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Harem   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Academy   Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cousins   Cross-dressing   Death   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Divination   Familiars   Loli   Male Protagonist   Onmyouji   Prophecies   Reincarnation   Resurrection   Secret Identity   Shikigami   Strong Love Interests   Trap   Tsundere   Weak to Strong
author: Azano Kouhei
description:
An Onmyodo School Fantasy of a Failing Private Onmyo Academy Student!!

Tsuchimikado Harutora was born into a prestigious Onmyoji family, but he can't see 'spirit energy'. Therefore, he's been enjoying a peaceful daily life with his friends at an Onmyo branch school. One day, his childhood friend Tsuchimikado Natsume, heir to the head family, suddenly appears. Will this cause his destiny spring into motion!?>
